nodes.bodyText:
I do not think we actually need this when we also have the immediate generic implementations wired through the EngineOrFactory class.
Where we would use SimpleValueEngine, we can just use EngineOrFactory(SimpleValueBuilderFactory::get()) instead.
nodes.diffHunk:
